name: DrawState

properties.name: mouseOver
properties.description: True if the cursor is hovering over this element.

properties.name: leftButtonPressed
properties.description: True if the left mouse button is being pressed.

properties.name: middleButtonPressed
properties.description: True if the middle mouse button is being pressed.

properties.name: rightButtonPressed
properties.description: True if the right mouse button is being pressed.

properties.name: hasFocus
properties.description: True if the element has the input focus.

properties.name: shiftKeyPressed
properties.description: True if the Shift key is being pressed.

properties.name: ctrlKeyPressed
properties.description: True if the Ctrl key is being pressed.

properties.name: cmdKeyPressed
properties.description: True if the Command key is being pressed (in Mac OS only).

properties.name: optKeyPressed
properties.description: True if the Option key is being pressed (in Mac OS only).

properties.name: altKeyPressed
properties.description: True if the Alt key is being pressed (in Windows only).

properties.name: numLockKeyPressed
properties.description: True if the Num Lock key is being pressed.

properties.name: capsLockKeyPressed
properties.description: True if the Caps Lock key is being pressed.

description: Describes an input state at the time of the triggering  ScriptUIGraphics.onDraw() event.
longdesc: Contains properties that report whether the current control has the input focus, and the particular mouse button and keypress state. Passed in as argument to ScriptUIGraphics.onDraw().
